Logic

Class DecisionMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Logic.DecisionMaker

  • public class DecisionMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    The class DecisionMaker is an empty class to be implemented by the client. It contains all the methods related to the decision process of the artificial intelligence.

    This class has all the methods needed to implement the decision process of the artificial intelligent the client wants to create. These different methods will cover parts of the process as active decision (choose which action do you want to do) and event handling like when a team scores a goal or how to react to a valid/invalid action. It also provides auxiliary methods to manage different functional events like the connection or disconnection to the server. It works together with the class EnvironmentInformation which provides all the informations available about the environment.

    Version:
    v0.1 04/10/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres
    See Also:
    Action, EnvironmentInformation

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecisionMaker

        public DecisionMaker(EnvironmentInformation env)
        Class Constructor.
        Parameters:
        env - an EnvironmentInformation with the information to use by the client.

    • Method Detail

      • makeDecision

        public Action makeDecision()
        Returns an Action the client wants to execute in the server.

        Returns an Action (preferably a valid Action) chosen by the client which will be executed by the server in the environment. This method works together with evaluateDecision method in the way that evaluateDecision gives feedback to the client informing whether the last Action executed was a valid action or not. This action will be the last Action chosen by the method makeDecision .

        Returns:
        an Action to be executed by the server in the given environment.

      • evaluateDecision

        public void evaluateDecision(boolean correct_action)
        This method gives feedback to the client informing whether the last Action executed was a valid action or not. This action will be the last Action chosen by the method makeDecision .
        Parameters:
        correct_action - true if the last Action was a valid Action and false if it was not.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        This method is executed during the disconnection process with the server.

        The client should use this method to implement all the necessary things to do during the disconnection process.

      • goal

        public void goal(boolean my_team_goal)
        This method is executed when any of the teams scores a goal.

        The client should use this method to implement all the necessary things to do when a goal is scored. The method also provides information to know which team scored the goal to act consequently.

        Parameters:
        my_team_goal - true if the team I'm playing for scored a goal, false otherwise.

      • shootToGoal

        public Action shootToGoal()
        This is an auxiliary method to use in case the client want to shoot the rival's goal.

        The client can use this method when he wants to shoot directly to the center of the rival goal. This method automatically aims for the center of the rival's goal and returns a SHOOT Action with the rival's goal coordinates.

        Returns:
        a SHOOT Action with the rival's goal coordinates.
